title: Best Easy Day Hikes Green Mountains (Best Easy Day Hikes Series)
features: The Best Easy Day Hikes series are handy, pocket-size guides for day hikers in America's most popular outdoor destinations. Each guide describes approximately 20-30 easy-to-follow, scenic trails in and around national parks, cities and urban areas, and popular outdoor destinations across America. With hikes varying from half-hour strolls to full-day adventures, these guidebooks are for everyone, including families.
description: Eli Burakian is a professional photographer. He has worked on numerous books with Globe Pequot and FalconGuides. He also wrote and photographed
Moosilauke: A Portrait of a Mountain

. He is an avid skier and hiker, and spends any time he can playing in the outdoors. He currently works for Dartmouth College as the college photographer and he lives with his wife, son, and two dogs in Windsor, Vermont. Visit him at BurakianPhotography.com.
